short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text ‘Trump’ with ‘The Orange Puppet.’

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instead of fear, loathing and dread of the Trump Presidency - lighten things up!
Replace every instance of 'Trump' on a web page with the words 'The Orange Puppet'
Feel better.
